1.label: Lifeline
1.description: Group 1 is lifeline group; all nodes which associated in this group will receive the messages sent by device through lifeline.

2.label: Control
2.description: Group 2 is controlling group, all nodes associated in this group will be controlled through BASIC_SET command by the device when device detects a movement event.

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: Sensitivity for motion detection. 0 = highest; 99 = lowest

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Window Time
paramInformation.description: Length of period during which motion is measured.

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Pulse Count
paramInformation.description: Number of times motion must be detected within the measuring period (as defined by param 2: Motion Window Time) before a motion detected message is sent.

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Blind Time
paramInformation.description: Time the sensor waits before sending a next motion detected message. This can be used to eliminate false positives by a light switching on or off due to the previously sent motion message.

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Clear Time
paramInformation.description: Time in seconds to wait before sending a 'Clear motion detected' message after the last motion was detected. This determines the minimum time the sensor remains on after motion was detected. Possible values are 10 to 3600 seconds.

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Basic Set Level
paramInformation.description: Value for BASIC_SET for nodes associated in Group 2. '100'- BASIC_SET = 0xFF (ON). '0'- BASIC_SET = 0x00 (OFF).

paramInformation.label: Light Sensor: Measuring Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval for light sensor measurement of ambient light intensity. Higher values result in longer battery life.

paramInformation.label: Light Sensor: Intensity Threshold
paramInformation.description: If the light intensity current measured is less than the settings, device will considered to be dark at current time. If configuration 13 is enabled and a motion event is detected, the device will send a BASIC_SET to the nodes that associated in group 2.

paramInformation.label: Light Sensor: Intensity Associated Enable
paramInformation.description: Send BASIC_SET commands to nodes in group 2 only if the environment is 'dark' (as defined by 12: 'Light Intensity Threshold').

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor: Report Once Enable
paramInformation.description: Suppress sending more Motion Event Report messages after the first Motion Event Report message was sent until a Motion Event Cleared Report message has been sent.
